titles.title: To provide that service performed in or under any of certain nonappropriated fund instrumentalities of the Government be creditable for purposes of the Federal Employees' Retirement System.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 11/4/1993--Introduced. Provides for the creditability of service in a nonappropriated fund instrumentality of the Department of Defense or the Coast Guard by employees of the legislative branch under the Federal Employees' Retirement System, subject to certain conditions.
